languages.text: Из вокс-устройства доносится тревожный шепот молитвы Императору... и на мгновение связист замолкает. Извиняясь и причитая, он передает, что собственное воображение сыграло с ним злую шутку — его товарищи идут впереди, все в здравии, а корабль вновь выглядит совершенно пустым.

traits.locale_text: Из вокс-устройства доносится тревожный шепот молитвы Императору... и на мгновение связист замолкает. Извиняясь и причитая, он передает, что собственное воображение сыграло с ним злую шутку — его товарищи идут впереди, все в здравии, а корабль вновь выглядит совершенно пустым.

languages.text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.
languages.original_text: Из вокс-устройства доносится тревожный шепот молитвы Императору... и на мгновение связист замолкает. Извиняясь и причитая, он передает, что собственное воображение сыграло с ним злую шутку — его товарищи идут впереди, все в здравии, а корабль вновь выглядит совершенно пустым.

traits.locale_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... And then he comes back, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

languages.text: 音阵中悄然传过一段焦急的祷告。操作员沉默了片刻……之后再次发出了声音，说好像是自己看到了幻觉。他的那些战友仍然走在他前面，每个人都活得好好的。虚空舰内部再次变得空空荡荡了。
languages.original_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

traits.locale_text: 音阵中悄然传过一段焦急的祷告。操作员沉默了片刻……之后再次发出了声音，说好像是自己看到了幻觉。他的那些战友仍然走在他前面，每个人都活得好好的。虚空舰内部再次变得空空荡荡了。

languages.text: 皇帝への不安そうな祈りが、ヴォクスから流れる。一瞬、オペレーターは黙り込んだが…突然戻ってきて、気のせいだったと言い訳をする。彼の仲間たちは今も元気に彼の前を歩いており、ヴォイドシップは再び完全に空っぽになったと。
languages.original_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝への不安そうな祈りが、ヴォクスから流れる。一瞬、オペレーターは黙り込んだが…突然戻ってきて、気のせいだったと言い訳をする。彼の仲間たちは今も元気に彼の前を歩いており、ヴォイドシップは再び完全に空っぽになったと。

languages.text: Por el voco se oye susurrar una angustiosa plegaria al Emperador. Por un momento, el operador se calla... y de repente vuelve, murmurando excusas sobre que su imaginación le juega malas pasadas. Sus compañeros siguen caminando delante de él, sanos y salvos, y la nave del vacío vuelve a estar completamente vacía.
languages.original_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

traits.locale_text: Por el voco se oye susurrar una angustiosa plegaria al Emperador. Por un momento, el operador se calla... y de repente vuelve, murmurando excusas sobre que su imaginación le juega malas pasadas. Sus compañeros siguen caminando delante de él, sanos y salvos, y la nave del vacío vuelve a estar completamente vacía.

languages.text: Ein nervös geflüstertes Gebet an den Imperator ist über das Vox zu hören. Einen Augenblick lang verstummt der Offizier ... dann ist er plötzlich wieder da und murmelt eine Entschuldigung, dass ihm seine Fantasie wohl einen Streich gespielt haben muss. Seine Kameraden gehen noch immer vor ihm, lebendig und wohlauf, und das Raumschiff sieht wieder vollkommen leer aus.
languages.original_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

traits.locale_text: Ein nervös geflüstertes Gebet an den Imperator ist über das Vox zu hören. Einen Augenblick lang verstummt der Offizier ... dann ist er plötzlich wieder da und murmelt eine Entschuldigung, dass ihm seine Fantasie wohl einen Streich gespielt haben muss. Seine Kameraden gehen noch immer vor ihm, lebendig und wohlauf, und das Raumschiff sieht wieder vollkommen leer aus.

languages.text: Les murmures d'une prière affolée à l'Empereur se font entendre sur le canal-vox. L'opérateur garde le silence l'espace de quelques instants... puis il reprend soudain la parole en marmonnant des excuses pour avoir laissé son imagination lui jouer des tours. Ses camarades sains et saufs poursuivent leur exploration du vaisseau, qui semble de nouveau entièrement désert.
languages.original_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.

Ses camarades sains et saufs poursuivent leur exploration du vaisseau, qui semble de nouveau entièrement désert.

languages.text: Vokstan endişeli bir İmparator duası fısıldanıyor. Bir an için operatör sessiz kalıyor... Ardından aniden konuşarak hayal gücünün ona oyunlar oynadığını mırıldanıyor ve bahaneler sunuyor. Sağlıkları yerinde ve iyi durumda olan yoldaşları, önünde yürüyor. Uçsuz gemisi yeniden tamamıyla boş görünüyor.
languages.original_text: An anxious prayer to the Emperor is whispered over the vox. For a moment, the operator falls silent... and suddenly returns, mumbling excuses about his imagination playing tricks on him. His comrades are still walking ahead of him, alive and well, and the voidship looks completely empty again.
